about.details:
Sonu Infratech Limited is engaged in the business of Civil Construction Services. The company's major business segments are Civil Construction Services, Building Construction, Mechanical Scaffolding, Plant Maintenance and Repairs and Maintenance and offer services such as piling, excavation, road preparation, land levelling, structural painting, building construction for commercial and industrial projects, mechanical scaffolding services including structuring and piping, Plant maintenance at various Reliance Plants and Farms, Nayara Maintenance, Repairs and Maintenance services such as plumbing, electrification, cleaning of vessels, etc.

Sonu Infratech Limited also owns and operates plants, machinery, and vehicles for all types of civil construction and infrastructure projects.

The company operates on a contract based model and is classified as a class "C" contract that allows them to bid on any type of military segment work in India. The company has successfully completed various contracts awarded by Military Engineering Services.

Competitive Strength:

  1. Established brand and image.
  2. Domain expertise and technical excellence.
  3. Impeccable Track Record.

faqs.question: What is the Sonu Infratech IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sonu Infratech IPO is a SME IPO of 2400000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹8.64 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹36 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on April 29, 2022, and closes on May 5, 2022.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sonu Infratech IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sonu Infratech IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sonu Infratech IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sonu Infratech IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sonu Infratech IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sonu Infratech IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sonu Infratech IPO opens on April 29, 2022 and closes on May 5, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sonu Infratech IPO?
faqs.answer: Sonu Infratech IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sonu Infratech IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sonu Infratech IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sonu Infratech IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sonu Infratech IPO will be done on Tuesday, May 10, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, May 12, 2022. Check the Sonu Infratech IPO allotment status.
